prompt_text: A fast-moving spell is coming your way. What will you do?

pass.message: You dodged the spell and advanced safely.

fail.message: The spell hit you, and you're knocked back!

partial_pass.message: You almost dodged the spell, but it grazed you.

prompt_text: You come across a locked door with a giant lock. What will you do?

pass.message: You broke the lock and proceeded through the door.

fail.message: You weren't strong enough to break the lock.

partial_pass.message: You managed to damage the lock, but it still holds.

prompt_text: You find a complex potion brewing station. Do you attempt to finish the potion?

pass.message: Your knowledge of potions paid off! You successfully brewed the potion and gained a useful item.

fail.message: You misread an ingredient, and the potion exploded!

partial_pass.message: The potion brewed, but its effecs are uncertain...

prompt_text: A tricky staircase shifts beneath your feet. Can you keep your balance?

pass.message: You swiftly regained your balance and made it safely to the next level.

fail.message: You lost your balance and tumbled down the stairs!

partial_pass.message: You wobbled but managed to stay on your feet.
